forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. East northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
A blanket of fog drapes softly across Downtown San Francisco as the night deepens into stillness. The crisp air carries whispers of the ocean, hinting at the cool tranquility expected in the coming hours. Overnight temperatures slide to a comfortable 46 degrees, with a gentle breeze teasing the outlines of the city’s architecture. As dawn approaches, expect the fog to retreat, yielding to the sun’s warm embrace. 

Saturday unfolds with a promise of vibrant clarity. By the midday sun, the city will bask in its typical, albeit crisp, winter glow, a high around 60 to warm the spirits and inspire strolls through the quieter streets. With a light northeast wind swirling around 3 to 12 mph, the day invites layers: a light jacket perhaps, paired with comfortable shoes, perfect for wandering through nearby parks or enjoying a coffee at a local café. As afternoon arrives and temperatures ease back to around 58, consider a slow walk to admire the enduring spirit of this beloved city—its unique mix of history and modernity dancing gently in the daylight. On days like this, the ordinary becomes extraordinary, beckoning you to enjoy life’s simple pleasures under the watchful eye of the golden sun.
